verses.verse: Now the angel <WH4397> of the Lord <WH3068> came <WH5927> up from Gilgal <WH1537> to Bochim. <WH1066> And he said, <WH559> "I brought <WH5927> you up out of Egypt <WH4714> and led <WH935> you into the land <WH776> which <WH834> I have sworn <WH7650> to your fathers; and I said, <WH1> 'I will never <WH559> <WH3808> break <WH5769> My covenant <WH6565> with you,

and as for you, you shall make <WH3772> no <WH3808> covenant <WH1285> with the inhabitants <WH3427> of this <WH2088> land; <WH776> you shall tear <WH5422> down <WH5422> their altars. <WH4196>' But you have not obeyed <WH8085> <WH6963> Me; what <WH4100> is this <WH2088> you have done <WH6213>?

"Therefore I also <WH1571> said, <WH559> 'I will not drive <WH1644> them out before <WH4480> <WH6440> you; but they shall become <WH1961> [as thorns] in your sides, <WH6654> and their gods <WH430> shall be a snare <WH4170> to you.'"

And it came <WH1961> about when the angel <WH4397> of the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> these <WH428> words <WH1697> to all <WH3605> the sons <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> that the people <WH5971> lifted <WH5375> up their voices <WH6963> and wept. <WH1058>
So they named <WH7121> <WH8034> that place <WH4725> Bochim; <WH1066> and there <WH8033> they sacrificed <WH2076> to the Lord. <WH3068>
When Joshua <WH3091> had dismissed <WH7971> the people, <WH5971> the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> went <WH1980> each <WH376> to his inheritance <WH5159> to possess <WH3423> the land. <WH776>

And the people <WH5971> served <WH5647> the Lord <WH3068> all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of Joshua, <WH3091> and all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of the elders <WH2205> who <WH834> survived <WH748> <WH3117> <WH310> Joshua, <WH3091> who <WH834> had seen <WH7200> all <WH3605> the great <WH1419> work <WH4639> of the Lord <WH3068> which <WH834> He had done <WH6213> for Israel. <WH3478>
Then Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun, <WH5126> the servant <WH5650> of the Lord, <WH3068> died <WH4191> at the age <WH1121> of one hundred <WH3967> and ten. <WH6235>

And they buried <WH6912> him in the territory <WH1366> of his inheritance <WH5159> in Timnath-heres, in the hill <WH2022> country <WH2022> of Ephraim, <WH669> north <WH6828> of Mount <WH2022> Gaash. <WH1608>

And all <WH3605> that generation also <WH1571> were gathered <WH622> to their fathers; and there arose <WH1> another <WH6965> generation after <WH312> them who <WH310> did not know <WH834> the Lord, <WH3045> nor <WH3068> yet <WH1571> the work <WH1571> which <WH4639> He had done <WH834> for Israel. <WH6213>
Then the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> did <WH6213> evil <WH7451> in the sight <WH5869> of the Lord, <WH3068> and served <WH5647> the Baals, <WH1168>

and they forsook <WH5800> the Lord, <WH3068> the God <WH430> of their fathers, who had brought <WH1> them out of the land <WH3318> of Egypt, <WH776> and followed <WH4714> <WH1980> other <WH310> gods <WH312> from [among] the gods <WH430> of the peoples <WH430> who <WH5971> were around <WH834> them, and bowed <WH5439> themselves down <WH7812> to them; thus they provoked <WH7812> the Lord <WH3707> to anger. <WH3068>
So they forsook <WH5800> the Lord <WH3068> and served <WH5647> Baal <WH1168> and the Ashtaroth. <WH9441>

And the anger <WH639> of the Lord <WH3068> burned <WH2734> against Israel, <WH3478> and He gave <WH5414> them into the hands <WH3027> of plunderers <WH8154> who plundered <WH8155> them; and He sold <WH4376> them into the hands <WH3027> of their enemies <WH340> around <WH5439> [them,] so that they could <WH3201> no <WH3808> longer <WH5750> stand <WH5975> before <WH6440> their enemies. <WH340>

Wherever <WH3605> <WH834> they went, <WH3318> the hand <WH3027> of the Lord <WH3068> was against them for evil, <WH9567> as the Lord <WH3068> had spoken <WH1696> and as the Lord <WH3068> had sworn <WH7650> to them, so that they were severely <WH3966> distressed. <WH9503>
Then the Lord <WH3068> raised <WH6965> up judges <WH8199> who delivered <WH3467> them from the hands <WH3027> of those who plundered <WH8154> them.

And yet <WH1571> they did not listen <WH8085> to their judges, <WH8199> for they played <WH2181> the harlot <WH2181> after <WH310> other <WH312> gods <WH430> and bowed <WH7812> themselves down <WH7812> to them. They turned <WH5493> aside <WH5493> quickly <WH4118> from the way <WH1870> in which <WH834> their fathers had walked <WH1> in obeying <WH1980> the commandments <WH8085> of the Lord; <WH4687> they did <WH3068> not do <WH6213> as [their fathers].

And when <WH3588> the Lord <WH3068> raised <WH6965> up judges <WH8199> for them, the Lord <WH3068> was with the judge <WH8199> and delivered <WH3467> them from the hand <WH3027> of their enemies <WH340> all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of the judge; <WH8199> for the Lord <WH3068> was moved <WH5162> to pity <WH5162> by their groaning <WH5009> because <WH4480> <WH6440> of those who oppressed <WH3905> and afflicted <WH1766> them.

But it came <WH1961> about when the judge <WH8199> died, <WH4194> that they would turn <WH7725> back <WH7725> and act <WH7843> more <WH4480> corruptly <WH7843> than <WH4480> their fathers, in following <WH1> <WH1980> other <WH310> gods <WH312> to serve <WH430> them and bow <WH5647> down <WH7812> to them; they did not abandon <WH7812> their practices <WH5307> or their stubborn <WH4611> ways. <WH7186>

So the anger <WH639> of the Lord <WH3068> burned <WH2734> against Israel, <WH3478> and He said, <WH559> "Because <WH3282> <WH834> this <WH2088> nation <WH1471> has transgressed <WH5674> My covenant <WH1285> which <WH834> I commanded <WH6680> their fathers, and has not listened <WH1> to My voice, <WH8085>

I also <WH1571> will no <WH3808> longer <WH3254> drive <WH3423> out before <WH4480> <WH6440> them any <WH376> of the nations <WH1471> which <WH834> Joshua <WH3091> left <WH5800> when he died, <WH4191>
in order <WH4616> to test <WH5254> Israel <WH3478> by them, whether they will keep <WH8104> the way <WH1870> of the Lord <WH3068> to walk <WH1980> in it as their fathers did, <WH1> or <WH8104> not. "

So the Lord <WH3068> allowed those <WH428> nations <WH1471> to remain, <WH5117> not driving <WH3423> them out quickly; <WH4118> and He did not give <WH5414> them into the hand <WH3027> of Joshua. <WH3091>
